brainly_data.question:
Earthquakes can _______.
a. trigger other earthquakes 
b. cause tsunamis 
c. cause billions of dollars in damages 
d. all of the above
brainly_data.subject: Geography

all_answers.question:
Earthquakes can _______.
a. trigger other earthquakes 
b. cause tsunamis 
c. cause billions of dollars in damages 
d. all of the above
all_answers.subject: Geography
all_answers.text:
D) All of the above

Earthquakes are horrific natural disturbances on earth shaking the earth so much, that it can pull down buildings causing loads of dollars in damage, upset the earth and trigger other earthquakes, or pull great big waves called tsunamis.
